Directions: In a large skillet, cook beef and pork over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Add the remaining ingredients. Transfer to a greased 3-qt. baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 1-1/2 hours or until the macaroni is tender, stirring every 30 minutes.
Ingredients: 2 (2.25 ounce) cans sliced ripe olives, drained
